languages.text: "Зачем выбирать? Разве мы не можем прийти к устраивающей нас всех договоренности?"

traits.locale_text: "Зачем выбирать? Разве мы не можем прийти к устраивающей нас всех договоренности?"

languages.text: "What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"
languages.original_text: "Зачем выбирать? Разве мы не можем прийти к устраивающей нас всех договоренности?"

traits.locale_text: "What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"
"What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"
"What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"
"What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"
"What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"

languages.text: 「選ぶことに何の意味が？皆が満足できる合意に至ることはできないのか？」
languages.original_text: "What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"

traits.locale_text: 「選ぶことに何の意味が？皆が満足できる合意に至ることはできないのか？」

languages.text: “为什么一定要做选择呢？就不能达成让所有人都满意的协议吗？”
languages.original_text: "What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"

traits.locale_text: “为什么一定要做选择呢？就不能达成让所有人都满意的协议吗？”

languages.text: « À quoi bon choisir ? Ne pouvons-nous trouver un arrangement qui convienne à tous ? »
languages.original_text: "What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"

traits.locale_text: « À quoi bon choisir ? Ne pouvons-nous trouver un arrangement qui convienne à tous ? »

languages.text: «¿Qué sentido tiene elegir? ¿No podemos llegar a un acuerdo que satisfaga a todo el mundo?».
languages.original_text: "What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué sentido tiene elegir? ¿No podemos llegar a un acuerdo que satisfaga a todo el mundo?».

languages.text: "Worin liegt der Sinn einer Entscheidung? Können wir nicht eine Vereinbarung treffen, mit der alle zufrieden sind?"
languages.original_text: "What is the point of choosing? Can't we all come to an agreement that is to everyone's satisfaction?"

traits.locale_text: "Worin liegt der Sinn einer Entscheidung? Können wir nicht eine Vereinbarung treffen, mit der alle zufrieden sind?"

languages.text: "Seçmenin ne manası var? Herkesi tatmin edecek bir anlaşmaya varamaz mıyız?"
